You can pay for your GLoan dues via your GLoan dashboard, Pay Bills, or outside the GCash app via our Payment Partners. Here’s how:

**Pay via GLoan dashboard**

1\. Tap **Pay Now** on the GLoan you wish to pay

![unnamed.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/39437897579673)

2\. On your GLoan management page, you can view the breakdown of your dues. Tap **Pay Loan**

![unnamed (1).png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/39437897580569)

3\. Input the amount you want to repay and tap **Next**

4\. Review the amount to be paid. Select **Pay**

You will see a confirmation of your successful GLoan repayment.

**Pay via Bills**

1. Open the GCash app and tap on **Bills > Fuse Financing Inc.**
2. Enter your Loan Account ID, select **GLoan**, and specify the amount you want to repay. Tap **Next**
3. Review the payment amount and tap **Confirm**

Payments via GCash Bills will reflect within **3 business days.**

**Pay via Payment Partners**

To pay your GLoan dues through our partners, enter **Fuse Financing Inc.** as the Biller and enter the corresponding **Account Number** below. Payments made through offline partners will be posted within **1 business day.** Here’s how to make payments with our partners:

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Payment Partner** | **Account Number** |
| [Bank of the Philippine Islands](https://www.bpi.com.ph/personal/bank/digital-banking/payments/pay-bills) | Loan Account ID (Found in your GLoan dashboard) |
| [Metrobank](https://www.metrobank.com.ph/services/mbonline/pay-bills-online) |
| [Banco de Oro (BDO)](https://www.bdo.com.ph/support-topics/v-internet-banking-performing-financial-transactions/bills-payment-how-do-i-get) | GCash Registered Mobile Number |
| [Bayad Center](https://www.bayad.com/#bayadcenter) |

If you pay your GLoan dues in full and in advance, you will receive an [**interest cashback**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30350171784217-What-happens-when-I-pay-my-total-GLoan-outstanding-balance-in-advance) within **14 business days** after the date of payment.
